history.proof: intros A R H l. induction l. - apply H. - apply consGRBar. apply IHl.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A), GRBar A R nil -> forall l : list A, GRBar A R l

Premises:
GRBar : forall A : Set, Rel A -> list A -> Set
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Rel = fun A : Set => A -> A -> Prop : Set -> Type Arguments Rel _%type_scope
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto
Fin.R : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n + ?m) where ?m : [ |- nat]
consGRBar : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (l : list A), GRBar A R l -> forall a : A, GRBar A R (a :: l)
subRelGRBar : forall (A B : Set) (R : Rel A) (S : Rel B) (f : A -> B), (forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b)) -> (forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a}) -> forall l : list A, GRBar A R l -> GRBar B S (map f l)
subRelGoodR : forall (A B : Set) (R : Rel A) (S : Rel B) (f : A -> B), (forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b)) -> forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> GoodR B S (map f l)
SearchG : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (a : A) (l : list A), GoodR A R l -> GoodR A R (a :: l)
GoodR_ind : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
GoodR_rec : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> Set), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
GoodR_rect : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> Type), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
GoodR_sind : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
FoundG : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (a : A) (l : list A), ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l -> GoodR A R (a :: l)
monGoodR1 : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (xs bs : list A), GoodR A R bs -> GoodR A R (xs ++ bs)
ForallOrdPairs_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
ForallOrdPairs_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
Inductive GoodR (A : Set) (R : Rel A) : list A -> Set := FoundG : forall (a : A) (l : list A), ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l -> GoodR A R (a :: l) | SearchG : forall (a : A) (l : list A), GoodR A R l -> GoodR A R (a :: l) Arguments GoodR _%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments FoundG _%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments SearchG _%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope
monGoodR : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (xs bs cs : list A), GoodR A R (xs ++ bs) -> GoodR A R (xs ++ cs ++ bs)
Forall2_ind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
Forall2_sind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
Bar_rec : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> Set) (P0 : forall l : list A, Bar A P l -> Set), (forall (l : list A) (p : P l), P0 l (Base A P l p)) -> (forall (l : list A) (b : forall a : A, Bar A P (a :: l)), (forall a : A, P0 (a :: l) (b a)) -> P0 l (Ind A P l b)) -> forall (l : list A) (b : Bar A P l), P0 l b
Inductive ForallOrdPairs (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := FOP_nil : ForallOrdPairs R nil | FOP_cons : forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> ForallOrdPairs R (a :: l) Arguments ForallOrdPairs [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments FOP_nil [A]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments FOP_cons [A]%type_scope [R]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
Ind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> Set) (l : list A), (forall a : A, Bar A P (a :: l)) -> Bar A P l
Inductive Bar (A : Set) (P : list A -> Set) : list A -> Set := Base : forall l : list A, P l -> Bar A P l | Ind : forall l : list A, (forall a : A, Bar A P (a :: l)) -> Bar A P l Arguments Bar _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Base _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Ind _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope _%function_scope
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Base : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> Set) (l : list A), P l -> Bar A P l
list_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Set), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
list_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l

```coq
intros A R H l.
induction l.
- exact H.
- apply consGRBar.
  exact IHl.
Qed.```
